Changelog:
Railworks 3 Train Simulator 2012 Deluxe Update 2 info:
- Fixes .Net4 installation repetition.

Railworks 3 Train Simulator 2012 Deluxe Update 1 info:
- In non-TSX mode, shadows are no longer influenced by camera position.
- Horseshoe Curve DLC doesn't crash when saved at certain places.
- Terrain editor has had an invalid option removed.
- Editor crash fixed in an edge case giving a stencil shadow missing error.
